changes: Added focus-visible styles to floating filter button
Added focus-visible styles to close panel button

patterns_discovered: Systematic approach to adding focus-visible styles across components
Using Tailwind CSS utility classes for consistent focus styling
Creating reusable .focus-ring utility class in globals.css
Dark mode compatibility in focus ring styles
gotchas_discovered: Not all interactive elements had consistent focus-visible styles initially
Need to maintain existing styling complexity while adding accessibility features
Ensuring keyboard navigation visibility across different components
Interactive buttons like close and reset need explicit focus styling

approach_outcome.description: Add focus-visible styles to the QuickFilterChip button component

recommendations: Continue implementing focus-visible styles across all interactive components
Create comprehensive accessibility test suite for keyboard navigation
Extract common button styling into reusable utility classes
Perform WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance audit after full implementation
Ensure focus styles are consistent across the entire application
